tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LearningPlans (
  plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id UUID,
  goal TEXT,
  skills_assessment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE skills_assessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  skill_area TEXT,
  proficiency_level TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE learning_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id INT,
  plan_start_date DATE,
  plan_end_date DATE,
  plan_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LearningPlan (
  plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id UUID,
  goal TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SkillsAssessment (
  assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id UUID,
  assessment_date DATE,
  skill_category TEXT,
  skill_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE Learner (
  learner_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  age INT,
  email TEXT
);
